match.title: 2nd ODI
match.statusText: Zimbabwe won by 7 wickets (with 35 balls remaining)

image.caption: General view of Harare Sports Club
image.longCaption: General view of Harare Sports Club

match.hoursInfo: 09:30 start, First Session 09:30-13.00, Interval 13.00-13:45, Second Session 13:45-17:15

headshotImage.longCaption: Chris Mpofu player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Nasir Hossain c Masakadza b Vitori 63 (92b 6x4 0x6 108m) SR: 68.47

dismissalComment.html: he has hit it straight to long on, end of a superb knock on debut, Nasir went for the big lofted shot over long on, seemed to have absolutely creamed it, but long on took a well-judged catch right on the boundary, Vitori just needs to turn up and right away a wicket falls

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Abdur Razzak b Vitori 35 (32b 1x4 1x6 55m) SR: 109.37

dismissalComment.html: another five-for for Vitori, international cricket is turning out to be a cakewalk for him, Razzak backs away outside leg and has a swing, misses, Vitori uproots off stump with a full delivery and takes off in celebration

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: dear me, this is becoming a bit of a pattern now, Tamim goes after Vitori and falls again, nothing shot, as in the first match, moving away from him on a length, bouncing, biting, just a bit of width and he thinks it needs to be crunched through point, just tried to force it away, went after it without moving the feet, and first slip took it almost as if he was waiting for it

headshotImage.caption: Imrul Kayes player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Imrul Kayes player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: suicidal tendencies spread through the Bangladesh line-up, this time Kayes thinks that a length delivery should be clattered through extra cover, he is nowhere to the pitch of the ball as he gets forward to thump it, and extra cover accepts the gift

he's given him! Swung in, Vitori has struck again, landed outside off and shaped in, nipped back further after pitching and Shakib was caught on the off stump, struck in line and the umpire had no hesitation

he has hit it straight to long on, end of a superb knock on debut, Nasir went for the big lofted shot over long on, seemed to have absolutely creamed it, but long on took a well-judged catch right on the boundary, Vitori just needs to turn up and right away a wicket falls

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: another five-for for Vitori, international cricket is turning out to be a cakewalk for him, Razzak backs away outside leg and has a swing, misses, Vitori uproots off stump with a full delivery and takes off in celebration

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: now then, even Elton has a wicket, they are just throwing it away, steady length ball darted across him, no need to do much with it, but he ends up pushing far away from the body, almost as if he has to, and extra cover cannot believe his luck

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: they find newer ways of going down out of nowhere, nothing shot again, wide delivery outside off stump, he just has a waft at it from the crease and Taibu is delighted as he snaps it up, that's the way he fell in the first innings of the Test as well

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal c Price b Vitori 3 (6b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: dear me, this is becoming a bit of a pattern now, Tamim goes after Vitori and falls again, nothing shot, as in the first match, moving away from him on a length, bouncing, biting, just a bit of width and he thinks it needs to be crunched through point, just tried to force it away, went after it without moving the feet, and first slip took it almost as if he was waiting for it

headshotImage.caption: Chris Mpofu player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chris Mpofu player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim c Ervine b Mpofu 12 (20b 2x4 0x6 22m) SR: 60

dismissalComment.html: oh well, now Rahim has given it away, why, oh why would you do that after looking in serene control, goes the way Ashraful did in the first match, not in control of the pull as Mpofu bangs it in, quickly on to him, he was not in a great position, and square leg will settle under that and take it easily

headshotImage.caption: Imrul Kayes player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Imrul Kayes player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Imrul Kayes player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Imrul Kayes c Masakadza b Vitori 8 (19b 1x4 0x6 33m) SR: 42.1

dismissalComment.html: suicidal tendencies spread through the Bangladesh line-up, this time Kayes thinks that a length delivery should be clattered through extra cover, he is nowhere to the pitch of the ball as he gets forward to thump it, and extra cover accepts the gift

dismissalText.commentary: Shahriar Nafees c Taylor b Chigumbura 14 (23b 3x4 0x6 32m) SR: 60.86

dismissalComment.html: now then, even Elton has a wicket, they are just throwing it away, steady length ball darted across him, no need to do much with it, but he ends up pushing far away from the body, almost as if he has to, and extra cover cannot believe his luck

dismissalText.commentary: Mohammad Ashraful c †Taibu b Chigumbura 6 (32b 0x4 0x6 43m) SR: 18.75

dismissalComment.html: they find newer ways of going down out of nowhere, nothing shot again, wide delivery outside off stump, he just has a waft at it from the crease and Taibu is delighted as he snaps it up, that's the way he fell in the first innings of the Test as well

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Mahmudullah c †Taibu b Utseya 3 (6b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: that is a lovely delivery, tossed up and going in with the angle, he has bowled that delivery well, he goes pushing inside the line looking for some sharp turn, there isn't any, and Taibu takes a neat catch

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Shakib Al Hasan lbw b Vitori 26 (47b 0x4 0x6 78m) SR: 55.31

dismissalComment.html: he's given him! Swung in, Vitori has struck again, landed outside off and shaped in, nipped back further after pitching and Shakib was caught on the off stump, struck in line and the umpire had no hesitation

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: another five-for for Vitori, international cricket is turning out to be a cakewalk for him, Razzak backs away outside leg and has a swing, misses, Vitori uproots off stump with a full delivery and takes off in celebration

headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Rubel Hossain run out (Chigumbura/†Taibu) 0 (1b 0x4 0x6 1m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: the innings is over with 15 deliveries to go, a mindless run out, pushes a full delivery towards extra cover and just takes off, non-striker takes a couple of steps too but then holds his hands up, but Rubel has too much momentum in to the run, and has no chance of getting back as the throw comes in to Taibu

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Vusi Sibanda st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mohammad Ashraful 67 (96b 7x4 0x6 127m) SR: 69.79

dismissalComment.html: Sibanda is gone, Ashraful gets the breakthrough, down the track to a tossed up ball, got too close and almost yorked himself, squeezed off the inside edge on to pad and the ball rolled to Rahim who found him well short

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Tatenda Taibu not out 61 (74b 4x4 2x6 89m) SR: 82.43

dismissalComment.html: Rahim gets the stumping, Mahmudullah gets another one to go straight on, tossed it up generously, lures him out of the crease for a push inside the line expecting the turn, and Rahim does not mess up this time

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: edged and gone, Shafiul has struck, he kept pegging away outside off stump on a length, Taylor pushed at it, and the edge flew straight and low to second slip

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shahriar Nafees b Shafiul Islam
dismissalText.commentary: Brendan Taylor c Shahriar Nafees b Shafiul Islam 3 (14b 0x4 0x6 11m) SR: 21.42

dismissalComment.html: edged and gone, Shafiul has struck, he kept pegging away outside off stump on a length, Taylor pushed at it, and the edge flew straight and low to second slip

dismissalText.commentary: Hamilton Masakadza st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mahmudullah 38 (51b 5x4 0x6 66m) SR: 74.5

dismissalComment.html: Rahim gets the stumping, Mahmudullah gets another one to go straight on, tossed it up generously, lures him out of the crease for a push inside the line expecting the turn, and Rahim does not mess up this time

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: Taibu brings up victory for Zimbabwe with a hungry pull in front of square leg, sees it dropped short, rocks back and latches on to it quickly

commentPostTextItems.html: That brings us to the end of the second game in the five-match series. Bangladesh need to win on Tuesday to stay alive before the series moves to Bulawayo. Join us at 9.30 am local time (1.30 pm Bangladesh time). Till then this is Abhishek Purohit signing off. Cheers!

Brian Vitori is the Man of the Match. Vitori: "I just stuck to the team plans and tried to hit the good areas. Every wicket was a bonus for us. It was really just about tying them down, we knew they would crack at some point. We still have three more to go, we have to make sure we win them."

Taylor: "Seamers came up trumps again, Vitori outstanding again, it made the batters' job easier. We have won the first game in the past against Bangladesh and then lost the series, so the guys are hungry for more success. We used the morning conditions well and after that it flattened out."

Shakib: "You can say that (crisis time), three games we have been outplayed. We all have to put our hands up, it is not only about me or someone else, it is about the team. We have to show the world we are good enough to compete. We did not bat well, simple as that. Wicket was a good one, out top order is not getting runs, it is hard for the lower order to come in and score."

Zimbabwe have treated the bustling Sunday crowd to a comprehensive victory, they had wobbled during their chase in the first ODI, but today's pursuit was a lot more clinical. Sibanda leading the way again with an assault in Razzak's first over, and he did not bowl after that. Taibu ensured the chase was smooth without any hassles, but Brian Vitori it was who set up the win with another five-wicket haul.

Bangladesh just not getting runs on the board, their bowlers did not have anything to work with. Rubel did not find any movement when he came on for his second spell, unlike in the first game when he troubled the middle order.

commentTextItems.html: even Ervine gets in to the act, sees one on leg stump and works it through square leg

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: Taibu gets to the pitch of a full and wide one, he is middling these solid little pushes well, gets it past the man at extra cover who lets it go through
short delivery banged in down leg

Taibu shows how it is done, slithers forward and guides with superb timing past point, he even comes back for the third, but there's more timing, the ricochet off a direct hit goes in to the boundary, and the cheers for his 50 only get louder
defended off the front foot on the off side
Ervine plays something apart from a defensive push, punches neatly but a good stop at mid off gives him only a single

commentPreTextItems.html: robert: "what is Ervine trying to do score the slowest ever score in ODI?"

commentTextItems.html: pushed with an open face, wide of point who gets to it, Taibu wants the single but has to rush back as the throw is fired in
Ervine defends resolutely again, off the front foot

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: dropped, lots of cheering around the ground as deep midwicket settles under a dolly, straight in and pops straight out, it is Mahmudullah, Taibu had got on the knee and cracked the slog sweep in the air straight to him
quicker and played with the turn towards short fine leg
defended off the front foot
can't work him on the leg side again as he misses and takes it on the pad again
turning in and bouncing, hits him high on to the pad
Ervine can't get a run at the moment, he is just content to get half-forward and block anything around the stumps

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: hurries him in to the short-arm pull with the short one, he goes hard after it and gets it in front of square leg in the air
that is a solid push, there were three men in that area, and he has timed the shot between short extra cover and cover
spirits forward and guides a nippy length ball past point

commentPreTextItems.html: mahm: "Captains argue BAD day n GOOD day in cricket !! But BD captain will argue BAD month- I am sure, I can BET!!"

commentTextItems.html: chop a fullish one in to the crease and it goes towards the keeper
on the pads from back of a length, he shuffles and gets it behind square leg

he's given him! Swung in, Vitori has struck again, landed outside off and shaped in, nipped back further after pitching and Shakib was caught on the off stump, struck in line and the umpire had no hesitation

he has hit it straight to long on, end of a superb knock on debut, Nasir went for the big lofted shot over long on, seemed to have absolutely creamed it, but long on took a well-judged catch right on the boundary, Vitori just needs to turn up and right away a wicket falls

headshotImage.caption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Abdur Razzak player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: another five-for for Vitori, international cricket is turning out to be a cakewalk for him, Razzak backs away outside leg and has a swing, misses, Vitori uproots off stump with a full delivery and takes off in celebration

that is a lovely delivery, tossed up and going in with the angle, he has bowled that delivery well, he goes pushing inside the line looking for some sharp turn, there isn't any, and Taibu takes a neat catch

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: now then, even Elton has a wicket, they are just throwing it away, steady length ball darted across him, no need to do much with it, but he ends up pushing far away from the body, almost as if he has to, and extra cover cannot believe his luck

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: they find newer ways of going down out of nowhere, nothing shot again, wide delivery outside off stump, he just has a waft at it from the crease and Taibu is delighted as he snaps it up, that's the way he fell in the first innings of the Test as well

headshotImage.caption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal c Price b Vitori 3 (6b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: dear me, this is becoming a bit of a pattern now, Tamim goes after Vitori and falls again, nothing shot, as in the first match, moving away from him on a length, bouncing, biting, just a bit of width and he thinks it needs to be crunched through point, just tried to force it away, went after it without moving the feet, and first slip took it almost as if he was waiting for it

headshotImage.caption: Chris Mpofu player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chris Mpofu player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim c Ervine b Mpofu 12 (20b 2x4 0x6 22m) SR: 60

dismissalComment.html: oh well, now Rahim has given it away, why, oh why would you do that after looking in serene control, goes the way Ashraful did in the first match, not in control of the pull as Mpofu bangs it in, quickly on to him, he was not in a great position, and square leg will settle under that and take it easily

headshotImage.longCaption: Imrul Kayes player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Brian Vitori player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Rubel Hossain run out (Chigumbura/†Taibu) 0 (1b 0x4 0x6 1m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: the innings is over with 15 deliveries to go, a mindless run out, pushes a full delivery towards extra cover and just takes off, non-striker takes a couple of steps too but then holds his hands up, but Rubel has too much momentum in to the run, and has no chance of getting back as the throw comes in to Taibu

headshotImage.caption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shafiul Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shahriar Nafees player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shahriar Nafees b Shafiul Islam
dismissalText.commentary: Brendan Taylor c Shahriar Nafees b Shafiul Islam 3 (14b 0x4 0x6 11m) SR: 21.42

dismissalComment.html: edged and gone, Shafiul has struck, he kept pegging away outside off stump on a length, Taylor pushed at it, and the edge flew straight and low to second slip

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Vusi Sibanda st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mohammad Ashraful 67 (96b 7x4 0x6 127m) SR: 69.79

dismissalComment.html: Sibanda is gone, Ashraful gets the breakthrough, down the track to a tossed up ball, got too close and almost yorked himself, squeezed off the inside edge on to pad and the ball rolled to Rahim who found him well short

dismissalText.commentary: Hamilton Masakadza st †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mahmudullah 38 (51b 5x4 0x6 66m) SR: 74.5

dismissalComment.html: Rahim gets the stumping, Mahmudullah gets another one to go straight on, tossed it up generously, lures him out of the crease for a push inside the line expecting the turn, and Rahim does not mess up this time

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu

stories.title: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2011
stories.subTitle: 2nd ODI
stories.summary: Wisden's review of the second ODI, Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2011

stories.title: Shakib blames batsmen's mindset for defeat
stories.subTitle: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI, Harare
stories.seoTitle: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI: Shakib blames batsmen's mindset for defeat
stories.summary: Shakib Al Hasan, the Bangladesh captain, blamed his misfiring batting line-up for his side's latest setback in Zimbabwe as they slumped to a 0-2 scoreline in the five-match ODI series

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu and Hamilton Masakadza celebrate a wicket
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu and Hamilton Masakadza celebrate a wicket, Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI, Harare, August 14, 2011

stories.title: Vitori gets five again as Zimbabwe make it 2-0
stories.subTitle: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI, Harare
stories.seoTitle: Zimbabwe v Bangladesh, 2nd ODI: Vitori gets five again as Zimbabwe make it 2-0
stories.summary: Zimbabwe stormed to another easy victory against Bangladesh, with another commanding all-round performance giving them a 2-0 series lead
